movies.name: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
movies.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

movies.name: John Wick
movies.description: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.

movies.name: Airplane!
movies.description: After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning, a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must land a commercial airplane full of passengers safely.

movies.name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
movies.description: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

movies.name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
movies.description: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

movies.name: The Big Lebowski
movies.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

movies.name: Caddyshack
movies.description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

movies.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
movies.description: A popular high school student, admired by his peers, decides to take a day off from school and goes to extreme lengths to pull it off.

movies.name: Alien
movies.description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

movies.name: A Quiet Place
movies.description: A family struggles for survival in a world where most humans have been killed by blind but noise-sensitive creatures.

movies.name: Jaws
movies.description: A killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

movies.name: Halloween
movies.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween, 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

movies.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
movies.description: Teenager Nancy Thompson must uncover the dark truth after she and her friends become targets of the spirit of a serial killer in their dreams.

movies.name: The Evil Dead
movies.description: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

movies.name: Fast and Furious
movies.description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world.

movies.name: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
movies.description: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movies.name: Now You See Me
movies.description: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances.

movies.name: Batman: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
